name: SuperBannanaBoii
description:
Sometimes they fall sometimes they fly, but either way Banana Boii NEEDS his bananas NOW, help him find his bananas or he will be endlessly stranded in the middle of the sky without bananas.

Use WASD and SPACE to chase the flying bananas to their final resting place so you can eat them and progress to the next level, when you win you will be rewarded with a shower of bananas.

Honestly I thought that I would go way over time, but somehow I was able to finish this game with only 2 seconds to spare (for the Trijam game jam). The whole process was actually surprisingly smooth (quite unusual for most of my projects) and the only real challenge was getting the sounds to work, because I always save sounds for last and then usually don't get to them.

After I had completed the game however getting it to work in WebGL proved to be quite challenging, but I got it eventually.

Thank you dreamstime.com for the free sound effects: https://www.dreamstime.com/correct-answer-sound-interface-dings-correct-answer-s...
